医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新型半合成化合物有望对抗耐药结核病美国微生物学会杂志《微生物学光谱》发表的一项新研究表明，一种新型半合成化合物可以从天然化合物中衍生出来，对结核分枝杆菌（包括多重耐药菌株）产生有效的活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Novel-semi-synthetic-compound-shows-promise-against-drug-pressive-tuberculosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Novel-semi-synthetic-compound-shows-promise-against-drug-pressive-tuberculosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=382f88ef-f1e1-4576-b2c3-9718e97cc77e Thu, 03 Oct 2024 09:58:44 -0400 Novel semi-synthetic compound shows promise against drug-resistant tuberculosis
研究人员在阿尔茨海默病药物开发方面取得突破由兰卡斯特大学领导的国际研究小组在治疗阿尔茨海默病的药物开发方面取得了有希望的突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Researchers-make-breakthrough-in-Alzheimers-disease-drug-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Researchers-make-breakthrough-in-Alzheimers-disease-drug-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f9b360e-5f72-4808-aca0-a9f07fe4ee97 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 09:57:33 -0400 Researchers make breakthrough in Alzheimer's disease drug development
对动物和细胞研究进行系统评价的新指南《自然评论方法引物》上的一篇新出版物为对动物和细胞研究进行严格的系统评论提供了必要的指导。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/New-guidelines-for-conducting-systematic-reviews-of-animal-and-cell-studies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/New-guidelines-for-conducting-systematic-reviews-of-animal-and-cell-studies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c49f3aef-e41a-4b94-82be-2f2eec5b2bfb Thu, 03 Oct 2024 09:20:59 -0400 New guidelines for conducting systematic reviews of animal and cell studies
有前途的研究为对抗耐药细菌带来了希望抗生素耐药细菌威胁着全球健康。然而，过去 50 年来，很少有新的抗生素进入市场。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Promising-research-offers-hope-in​​-fight-against-pressive-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Promising-research-offers-hope-in​​-fight-against-pressive-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8149de79-d468-4db9-918e-0e0e73f43525 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 08:16:00 -0400 Promising research offers hope in the fight against resistant bacteria
新研究表明，富含抗氧化剂的饮食有助于降低女性不孕的风险研究表明，增加抗氧化剂的消耗可以预防女性不孕，解决生殖疾病中的氧化应激。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Antioxidant-rich-diet-could-help-lower-risk-of-infertility-in-women-new-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Antioxidant-rich-diet-could-help-lower-risk-of-infertility-in-women-new-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=deb3d6a6-7c47-46e5-b108-a54aa1de7cfb Thu, 03 Oct 2024 08:15:00 -0400 Antioxidant-rich diet could help lower risk of infertility in women, new study suggests
食物过敏患者和护理人员经历的高度心理困扰心理困扰在食物过敏患者中很常见，但阿斯顿大学研究人员共同领导的一项新研究表明，那些陷入困境的人几乎得不到支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/High-psychological-distress-experienced-by-food-allergy-病人-and-caregivers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/High-psychological-distress-experienced-by-food-allergy-病人-and-caregivers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f30cfec7-4767-4760-92a1-bcf12c91ed45 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 08:13:43 -0400 High psychological distress experienced by food allergy patients and caregivers
研究表明肥胖和糖尿病与肝癌复发率较高有关肝细胞癌是一种与肝炎感染相关的肝癌，已知癌症切除后复发率很高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Study-links-obesity-and-diabetes-to-higher-recurrence-rates-in-liver-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Study-links-obesity-and-diabetes-to-higher-recurrence-rates-in-liver-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b9a6690-fd38-4d9e-9edc-862f3aa5e418 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 08:09:00 -0400 Study links obesity and diabetes to higher recurrence rates in liver cancer
与 COVID-19 疫苗接种率相关的医疗保健提供地点和患者层面特征2022 年 12 月推出的 COVID-19 疫苗在降低全球与大流行相关的死亡率和发病率方面发挥了关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Health-care-delivery-site-and- Patient-level-characteristics- Associated-with-COVID-19-vaccination-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Health-care-delivery-site-and-patent-level-characteristics-linked-with-COVID-19-vaccination-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f2d6159-0741-41ab-89ab-8bd20517ea3d Thu, 03 Oct 2024 07:59:54 -0400 Health care delivery site- and patient-level characteristics associated with COVID-19 vaccination rates
GPT-4 在分析脑肿瘤放射学结果中的诊断性能GPT-4展示了脑放射学的诊断能力，在最近的研究中最终诊断准确率达到73%，鉴别诊断准确率达到94%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Diagnostic-performance-of-GPT-4-in-analyzing-radiology-findings-from-brain-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Diagnostic-performance-of-GPT-4-in-analyzing-radiology-findings-from-brain-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba98978b-3231-4f68-b9f1-748b44064b86 Thu, 03 Oct 2024 07:52:00 -0400 Diagnostic performance of GPT-4 in analyzing radiology findings from brain tumors
研究揭示政策变化对儿童肝移植结果的影响肝移植是目前治疗小儿急性肝衰竭（PALF）的唯一方法，这是一种快速进展且危及生命的疾病，可能影响以前健康的儿童。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Study-reveals-impact-of-policy-changes-on-pediatric-liver-transplant-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241003/Study-reveals-impact-of-policy-changes-on-pediatric-liver-transplant-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c0919b4-b4c7-4d70-a402-d56091fd7bec Thu, 03 Oct 2024 07:40:09 -0400 Study reveals impact of policy changes on pediatric liver transplant outcomes
